calc_bg() - Method in class mage.Core.Oligo

Calculates the Blast Oligo scores for every oligo on the genome given the current valid set
calc_dg() - Method in class mage.Core.Oligo
Calculates the Free energy for all positions on the span Stores result in the dg_scores arraylist

Calculates the primary score associated with the span.
